浻字的基本解释

浻
jiǒng
〔浻澋（
j媙g ）〕（水）回旋。

浻
jiōng
古池名。

浻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǒng］
［《廣韻》烏猛切，上梗，影。］
［《集韻》俱永切，上梗，見。］
见“浻澋”。

浻字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　浻； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页625第20
【廣韻】【集韻】?烏猛切，音䁝。浻澋，水回旋貌。【郭璞·江賦】泓汯浻澋。　又【集韻】俱永切，音憬。義同。

浻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
浻字的起名意思

同“媙”，指女美貌，也指水回旋，也用作古池名。

浻
Basic explanation of words
浻
jiǒng
〔浻澋(
j 媙g)] (water) whirl.
浻
jiōng
Ancient pool name.
浻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǒng］
["Guangyun" Wu cuts fiercely, the upper stem, the shadow. ]
["Jiyun" is always cut, on the stem, see. ]
See "浻澋".
浻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Character Department] 　浻; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 625 No. 20
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Wu cuts fiercely, and sounds eccentric.浻澋, water swirling appearance. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Hong Luan Luan.　[Jiyun] All cut forever, longing for sound. The same meaning.
浻
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
浻
Name meaning
Same as "媙", it refers to the beauty of women, also refers to the water circle, and is also used as the name of the ancient pond.
jiǒng, jiōng
